articles.content: It probably wasn't the tightest game seen at Hackett Neighbourhood Oval, but last weekend the Wood Ducks XI fell seven runs short of Barton CC in a tense round eight fixture of the Canberra City and … [+8677 chars]

articles.author: Chloe Hart
articles.title: Cronulla's Bronson Xerri is appealing his four-year doping ban but Sandor Earl says Xerri can return to the game even if he loses - ABC News
articles.description: Bronson Xerri is appealing a four-year doping ban, but former NRL star Sandor Earl says his experience shows the suspended Cronulla Sharks player can make a future comeback if he wants.
articles.content:
Suspended Cronulla Sharks youngster Bronson Xerri faces the NRL Appeals Tribunal before Christmas over his doping ban, but it will be weeks before his fate is decided.
